Tue, 17 Sep 2024 23:02:18 +0000 Libby Clark with her children Eleanor (left), twins Liam (centre) and Jacob (right), and oldest Ethan. Simon Clark passed away in June due to multiple myeloma, and his family are now set to be part of the 'Shine for a Cure' event, the first lantern ceremony of its kind to raise critical funds for New Zealanders impacted by blood cancer. Photographed at home in Te Atatu. Photo / Sylvie Whinray
